title: Lawmakers sound alarm on ‘deadliest place on earth to be a Christian’ as Nigeria violence escalates
text: Congress confronted the Nigeria crisis as witnesses describe mass killings and kidnappings targeting Christians. A subcommittee called for a stronger U.S. response to persecution.
